main_definition: Families refer to groups of individuals related by blood, marriage, or adoption, living together and sharing a common household.

meanings_and_examples.example: My family consists of my parents, siblings, and grandparents.
I am part of an extended family that includes aunts, uncles, cousins, nieces, and nephews.
My nuclear family is my spouse and our two children living with us.
She was raised in an adoptive family, which includes her parents who adopted her at birth.
After his divorce, he formed a blended family with his ex-wife and their children from previous marriages living together.
Unfortunately, some young individuals get involved in negative activities forming gang families or cliques.
